title: Learn Tshivenda Alphabets | A-N | Kids Learn Tshivenda | Ep.2
content: [Music] so namusi ri do guda so namusi ri do guda so namusi ri do guda alphabets dza chivenda ri do thoma nga a u alphabets dza chivenda ri do thoma nga a u alphabets dza chivenda ri do thoma nga a u swika n a u swika n a u swika n a u swika n swika n swika n okay so ndi khou humbela uri ni dovha ni divhe uri into okay so ndi khou humbela uri ni dovha ni divhe uri into okay so ndi khou humbela uri ni dovha ni divhe uri into vendom a ri na c and ri dovha ri si vendom a ri na c and ri dovha ri si vendom a ri na c and ri dovha ri si na j naa no lugela u na j naa no lugela u na j naa no lugela u guda kha ri ye khalo ḽeḓere ḽa u thoma ndi ḽine ḽine ḽa amba u eḓela zwi amba uri amba uri amba uri ni shumise forogo a e means for ḽine legere m ine ya vha ningo yanu ndi khou ine ya vha ningo yanu ndi khou ine ya vha ningo yanu ndi khou livhuwa u joiner nne namusi ndi do livhuwa u joiner nne namusi ndi do livhuwa u joiner nne namusi ndi do ni vhona vhanna tshifhinga tshidaho zwine zwa amba bye
